meanings.definition: A person with whom one exchanges letters, typically someone in a foreign country whom one has not met in person.
meanings.sent1: My penfriend from Japan sends me letters with beautiful stamps.
meanings.sent2: I have a penfriend in France who tells me about her life in Paris.
meanings.sent3: My penfriend and I pretend to be secret agents in our letters.
meanings.sent4: Having a penfriend is like having a window to a different world.
meanings.sent5: The idea of a penfriend is like having a faraway friend through letters.

meanings.definition: To correspond with someone by sending letters back and forth.
meanings.sent1: I penfriend with my cousin who lives in another state.
meanings.sent2: She and I penfriend regularly, sharing stories and updates.
meanings.sent3: Let's penfriend each other and see who can write the longest letter!
meanings.sent4: Penfriending allows us to connect in a more personal way than texting.
meanings.sent5: We decided to penfriend instead of emailing to make our communication more special.
